Welcome to Citrix SDK Portal
============================

Citrix SDK Portal contains SDK documents for major Citrix product.
Include StoreFront, Desktop Delivery Controller, Desktop Director, HTML5 Receiver and XenServer

.. _Read the docs: http://readthedocs.org/

The main documentation for the site is organized into a couple sections: (Think of it as *Continuous Documentation*).

* :ref:`sf-sdk`
* :ref:`ddc-sdk`
* :ref:`dir-sdk`
* :ref:`html5-sdk`
* :ref:`xs-sdk`

.. _sf-sdk:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: StoreFront SDK
   
   sf/getting_started
   sf/sample_code
   sf/api_reference

.. _ddc-sdk:
.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Desktop Delivery Controller SDK
   
   ddc/getting_started
   ddc/sample_code
   ddc/api_reference

.. _dir-sdk:
   
.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Desktop Director SDK

   dir/getting_started
   dir/sample_code
   dir/api_reference

.. _html5-sdk:
   
.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: HTML5 Receiver SDK

   h5/getting_started
   h5/sample_code
   h5/api_reference

.. _xs-sdk:
   
.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: XenServer SDK

   xs/getting_started
   xs/sample_code
   xs/api_reference
